title: Tennis Podcast: Andy Murray's comeback is complete - so what will 2020 hold?
text:
Just when Tennis Podcast presenters Catherine Whitaker (Amazon Prime Video) and David Law (BBC 5 Live) thought they had seen it all from Andy Murray, he surprised them once more by beating Stan Wawrinka to win the title in Antwerp, just 10 months after it looked like he was about to retire from the sport.

How did it feel to see Murray lift the trophy? In what way had he been steadily building up to this moment over the last eight weeks? And how significant was it that he won by playing his trademark style of tennis?
description: Just when Tennis Podcast presenters Catherine Whitaker (Amazon Prime Video) and David Law (BBC 5 Live) thought they had seen it all from Andy Murray, he surprised them once more by beating Stan Wawrinka to win the title in Antwerp, just 10 months after it looked like he was about to retire from the sport.
